body_html:
Hi I think "making the tensorflow integration with windows more smooth" should in general be a feature request, consider it will benefit a large community such as real-time computer graphics and video games etc.
…
On Mon, Sep 4, 2017 at 4:15 PM, Justine Tunney ***@***.***> wrote: This question is better asked on StackOverflow <http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow> since it is not a bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there. Thanks! — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. body:
Hi I think "making the tensorflow integration with windows more smooth"
should in general be a feature request,
consider it will benefit a large community such as real-time computer
graphics and video games etc.

On Mon, Sep 4, 2017 at 4:15 PM, Justine Tunney <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> <http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow> since it is not a
> bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads
> questions there. Thanks!
